name: NATO Assault Course
description: In NATO Assault Course, one or two players compete in an obstacle course as one of four characters - the Hitman, the Ninja, the Flame, and Tommo. To do this, they must accomplish certain tasks including jumping over brick walls, crawling through pipes, jumping over fire pits, crawl across a tightrope, and using their weapon to fire at targets. The winner is the first one over the finish line. The game includes a course designer that allows players to design their own courses, then compete in them.

shot.caption: The game's title screen. This does not stay complete for long, for some reason a black patch wipes out part of the text during the latter part of the game load sequence
Option 3 from the main menu brings up the course selection screen where the player can design their own course
The start of a single player practice session. I guess the other half of the screen is used for a 2-player game
